attributes.action: Withdraw the propsal to use talking CCTV cameras to monitor town centres.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is in the process of issuing 20 town centres with CCTV equipment which will shout instructions to people who committee anti-social behaviour acts. Besides the fact these cameras will be costing the government an estimate £500,000 they are also a significant infringement of our civil liberties. 

We are already the most watched nation on earth and are rapidly becoming a big brother society. With the installations of these talking cameras the government has further intruded into our every day life. It is time there was a stop to Britain becoming a ‘surveillance society’.
